general.name: getXMLconfig
general.shortDesc: Opens a user config file of an application.

definition.desc: Opens an XML config file of a specified application inside the user's configurations directory, and returns it in the form of an array.

params.name: filename
params.desc: Name of the file to open.

definition.return: If the function succeeds, returns an array with the contents of the read file. Otherwise, returns false.
